title: Why are my images getting cropped?
body:
Take this one for instance:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/ctx0Ta4N-give-urgot-what-he-wants?comment=00000002

As oppose to this one from several months ago before this started happening:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/t4shP2mn-hey-sion-why-didnt-you-help-us?comment=0000000000000000

replies.body:
Add [/img] or ?noredirect to the end of the link.

http://i.imgur.com/HUPquSo.png

http://i.imgur.com/HUPquSo.png[/img]

Also copy-paste the image URL, not the page address. (it'll end in .jpg)

Nope, didn't work.

EDIT: Okay, this is weird, I tried that, no luck. Let me try again from a quote of you.

Sorry, had to edit it. Copy the image URL and paste that instead of the page address. You can right click and open image in new tab if you want the image on a page by itself (better for saving the link).
Okay, now I get it. I switched from the direct link earlier when trying to trouble shoot. Works with [\img] and direct link COMBINED. Thanks!
